Description:
Experience: 3-5 years  Requirements: Windows Desktop and Server Management 
Virtualisation 
Debian or Ubuntu 
Very good Networking knowledge, including VPN 
Able to set up and manage: 
Firewall / router appliances (physical and virtual) including opensource like pfsense 
Windows server 
Linux Server 
Virtual Machines on Cloud or on-premise infrastructure 
Basic Windows Services (AD, File, Print) 
Basic Linux Services (mail, ssh, web, proxy) 
Antivirus and Patch Management on Multiple Devices 
Administration and Maintenance of different Backup Solution 
Should be able to manage Exchange online, Office 365 and Azure AD connect 
Must have at least 3 years direct exposure to end customers in North America and/or Europe 
Should be senior person able to work without supervision and subordinates, ideally with potential to lead a team in futureSkills
